ingredients: plus 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided
Taleggio cheese,* rind trimmed, cheese cut into six 2-inch-long slices
unpeeled Japanese eggplant, ends trimmed, eggplant cut into 1/2-inch-wide rounds (about 5 1/2 cups)
*A semisoft cheese; available at some specialty foods stores and at Italian markets.
